title: These are the most ‘underrated’ Mass. towns in 2025, according to Worldatlas.com

title: Paul Pierce identifies mindset that Jaylen Brown can’t afford to have playing without Jayson Tatum
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics "He can’t have the mindset like, I’ve got to go in and score more points because we’re losing points in Tatum.
" Jaylen Brown Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff For the first time since his rookie season in 2017, Jaylen Brown will face the prospect of playing without Jayson Tatum for an extended period of time.
Tatum came in and started 80 games as a 19-year-old rookie 2018 and hasn’t missed more than 18 games in a season during his eight year career.

title: ‘RushTok’ madness hits New England: Sorority TikTok craze comes for Massachusetts girls
author: The Boston Globe
bullets: The Boston Globe With $5,000 rush consultants, synchronized dance videos, and spray tans, Northeast girls are buying into TikTok’s sorority obsession.
Sorority recruits lined the sidewalk of sorority row at the University of Alabama on Aug.
14 in Tuscaloosa, Ala.

title: A former Apple exec just gave UMass Amherst its largest donation ever. Here’s how much.
author: Madison Lucchesi

made the largest donation in UMass' history on Monday.

title: Robert Redford, Oscar-winning actor, director, and indie patriarch, dies at 89
author: The Associated Press
bullets: Entertainment After rising to stardom in the 1960s, Redford was one of the biggest stars of the ’70s with such films as “The Candidate,” “All the President’s Men” and “The Way We Were,” capping that decade with the best director Oscar for 1980's “Ordinary People,” which also won best picture.
Robert Redford, in 2018.
Charles Sykes / Invision / AP, File ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Boston.com readers are mostly happy, but the unhappy ones have a lot of feelings

bullets: Readers Say “Some people are not happy unless everyone else is as miserable as they are.
